recipe.title: Vitamin C Brew
ingredients: American style lager (such as Miller High Life)
instructions: Combine 2 ounces fresh orange juice and 1 ounce gin in a pint glass filled with ice. Top off with Americanstyle lager (such as Miller High Life). Garnish with an orange wheel.
